Text: FW Enron Direct pricing update SMEDPST Jon can you update some SMED prices for me I would like to communicate to Kelly McNeill on Monday morning Darren Original Message From Dickin Mark Sent Friday August AM To Cc Subject Enron Direct pricing update SMED Hi Kelly We have had a quick selloff in gas prices this AM A tropical wave that some were fearing would develop into a hurricane has not progressed and the fear that Gulf of Mexico gas production facilities would be threatened has dissipated As well hedge fund selling has pushed the market a little lower Indicative prices subject to revision for SMEDs load shape commencing Nov yr CGJ yr CGJ yr CGJ yr CGJ Please let me know if there is anything further I can do for you at the moment I will be leaving on holidays later today and will be returning on Aug In my absence Greg Mann and Kate Joslyn are familiar with SMEDs requirements and would be pleased to assist Regards Mark Dickin Sales Manager

Load Balancing Legal vs Practical Cc PST Jon please find attached a summary of the load balancing requirements for gas and power accounts Thanks for all your help in resolving the load following risk mgt issue Darren

SMEDPST Jon I am speaking with SMED first thing tomorrow morning between and around their gas needs they appear to finally be ready to get this one off their plates Can you get me fresh and year prices out of Nov st Ill hopefully quit bugging you on this one very soon DC

UK Contacts Cc PST Jon per our discussion this morning The names of the folks on the Wholesale Gas side in Enron UK who would be knowledgeable of how load following deals are handled Dave Redmond Peter Crilly Other comments from Charlie CrossleyCooke they continue to do large numbers of load following power deals each week in the UK Louise Kitchen was the architect of putting the process in place to manage the risk associated with natural gas load following deals they have load profiles in the UK all customers would be classified into one of these load profiles these profiles are used to put their hedges in place Please keep us plugged in as to your progress it goes without saying that resolving this problem is of prime importance to Enron Direct Darren
Still aroundTych you still employed DC
